author: By PAUL J. WEBER Associated Press
title: Texas closes school through May, extends social restrictions
description: AUSTIN, Texas (AP) — Republican Gov. Greg Abbott said Tuesday that Texas' schools will stay closed through at least May and imposed restrictions that doctors and even his critics say amount to a stay-at-home order for the state — despite…
